projects.name: Big Lemon Restaurant
projects.description: Portfolio project from Meta frontend developer course on Coursera, the project was build using react where the focus was on the use of components

projects.name: Europris Online store redesign
projects.description: This school project involved redesigning Europris's online store based on our market and user research. We identified that customers often complained about the cluttered website and difficulty in finding products. Our final design prioritizes accessibility, decluttering, and creating a simple, intuitive user interface.
